basics.name: siddharth salunkhe
basics.about: passionate about web development, C++, Kubernetes, and Linux. focused on building scalable systems and developer tools that make the web a better place. when not in front of a terminal, you'll find me exploring mechanical keyboards and contributing to open source.

experience.description: worked on managing and maintaining Linux servers

projects.name: microservices-app
projects.description: modern microservices-based application showcasing proficiency in advanced software architecture and DevOps practices

projects.name: simple C++ shell
projects.description: A simple shell written in C++ from scratch. It supports various shell-like features including command execution, piping, background processes, and I/O redirection.

projects.name: Message Punk
projects.description: A chat app built with MERN stack and TypeScript, featuring real-time messaging, typing indicators, group creation, and member management using Socket.io.

projects.name: YelpCamp
projects.description: A website for creating and reviewing campgrounds with RESTful routing, user authentication, authorization, and map integration.

projects.name: Neural Style Transfer
projects.description: An application that applies the style of one image to another using a pre-trained TensorFlow Hub model.

projects.name: Simple Neural Network
projects.description: A two-layer neural network trained on the MNIST dataset to recognize digits from 0 to 9.

projects.name: Code Submissions
projects.description: A full-stack web application with Express.js, MySQL, Redis, and React that supports online code execution using the Judge0 API (partial implementation).

projects.name: Collection of Small Full-Stack Applications
projects.description: A collection of full-stack applications developed for academic purposes, showcasing expertise in React, Express, Node.js, and MySQL.

writing.title: Writing a shell from scratch in C++
